#An example of performing t-test

library("Biobase")
source("Dataset.R")
dat <- new("Dataset")
dat <- readDataset(dat, "Lipidomics_Data.csv",               "Lipidomics_pdata2.csv")
tt.res <- univariateTTest(dat.3d, "Phenotype") ## where "Phenotype" is the name of the pData column that contains two levels.
## See the result!!
View(tt.res)
